context: The word 'lasen' is the 1st person singular present tense form of the Estonian verb 'lasta', which means 'to allow, to permit, to let'. It can also be part of other verbs with different meanings depending on context. In some contexts, it appears as a component in compound verbs where it may contribute to the meaning of 'releasing' or 'unfastening'. The conjugation shows subject agreement (1st person singular) and tense (present).
